channel.title: Saline Stress on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Saline Stress on funPlantGenes

item.title: GmDnaJA6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G134400 Gene Symbol: GmDnaJA6 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpressing GmDnaJA6 and investigate their response to saline–alkaline stress, and identify proteins that interact with GmDnaJA6.

item.title: GmPIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g015300 Gene Symbol: GmPIP1|6 Gene Name: plasma membrane intrinsic protein 1|6 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The effects of constitutive overexpression of GmPIP1|6|GmPIP1|6 in soybean was examined under normal and salt stress conditions.

item.title: LeNHX2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeNHX2 Gene Name: Na+/H+ antiporter 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The K+/H+ antiporter LeNHX2 increases salt tolerance by improving K+ homeostasis in transgenic tomato.

item.title: MsFLS13
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MsFLS13 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: Our findings highlight the crucial role of MsFLS13 in alfalfa in response to saline-alkali stress and provide a novel genetic resource for creating saline-alkali-resistant alfalfa through genetic engineering.

item.title: OsLOX10
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os11g36719 RAPdb gene ID: Os11g0575600 Gene Symbol: OsLOX10 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PutHKT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PutHKT2|1 Gene Name: high-affinity K+ transporter Genome: Species: Puccinellia tenuiflora Functional Descriptions: A high-affinity K+transporter PutHKT2|1|PutHKT2|1 cDNA was isolated from the salt-tolerant plant Puccinellia tenuiflora.

item.title: SlJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc07g042170.3 Gene Symbol: SlJAZ1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlWRKY81 regulates Spd synthesis and Na+/K+ homeostasis through interaction with SlJAZ1 mediated JA pathway to improve tomato saline-alkali resistance.

item.title: SlWRKY80
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g095770.2 Gene Symbol: SlWRKY80 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlWRKY80-mediated jasmonic acid pathway positively regulates tomato resistance to saline-alkali stress by enhancing spermidine content and stabilizing Na+/K+ homeostasis.

item.title: SlWRKY81
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soly09g014990.3 Gene Symbol: SlWRKY81 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlWRKY81 regulates Spd synthesis and Na+/K+ homeostasis through interaction with SlJAZ1 mediated JA pathway to improve tomato saline-alkali resistance.

item.title: TaCHP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS7D02G545700 Gene Symbol: TaCHP Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: ZmEREB57
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb193060 Gene Symbol: ZmEREB57 Gene Name: AP2-EREBP-transcription factor 57 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.
